AddDataSource.title: AddDataSource
AddDataSource.summary: Adds a data source to a cloud account that is added to the threat analysis feature.

AddDataSourceLog.title: AddDataSourceLog
AddDataSourceLog.summary: Adds logs of a cloud account to the threat analysis feature.

AddUserSourceLogConfig.title: AddUserSourceLogConfig
AddUserSourceLogConfig.summary: Adds the logs of a cloud service within a cloud account to the threat analysis feature for alert and event anslysis.

BindAccount.title: BindAccount
BindAccount.summary: Adds a third-party cloud account that is displayed on the Multi-cloud assets tab of the Feature Settings page to the threat analysis feature.

CloseDelivery.title: CloseDelivery
CloseDelivery.summary: Disables the log delivery feature for a cloud service.

DeleteAutomateResponseConfig.title: DeleteAutomateResponseConfig
DeleteAutomateResponseConfig.summary: Deletes the automated response rule with a specified ID.

DeleteBindAccount.title: DeleteBindAccount
DeleteBindAccount.summary: Removes a third-party cloud account that is added to the threat analysis feature by using its AccessKey ID. You can add another cloud account based on your business requirements.

DeleteCustomizeRule.title: DeleteCustomizeRule
DeleteCustomizeRule.summary: Deletes a rule by rule ID.

DeleteDataSource.title: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.summary: Removes a data source that is no longer required.

DeleteWhiteRuleList.title: DeleteWhiteRuleList
DeleteWhiteRuleList.summary: Deletes an alert whitelist rule with a specified ID.

DescribeAggregateFunction.title: DescribeAggregateFunction
DescribeAggregateFunction.summary: Queries the aggregate functions that are supported for a custom rule.

DescribeAlertScene.title: DescribeAlertScene
DescribeAlertScene.summary: Queries the scenarios in which an alert needs to be added to the whitelist.

DescribeAlertSceneByEvent.title: DescribeAlertSceneByEvent
DescribeAlertSceneByEvent.summary: Queries the scenarios and objects that can be added to an alert whitelist rule.

DescribeAlertSourceWithEvent.title: DescribeAlertSourceWithEvent
DescribeAlertSourceWithEvent.summary: Queries the data sources of the alert that is associated with an event.

DescribeAlertType.title: DescribeAlertType
DescribeAlertType.summary: Queries the threat types that you can select when you create a custom rule.

DescribeAlertsCount.title: DescribeAlertsCount
DescribeAlertsCount.summary: Queries the number of alerts of different severities.

DescribeAlertsWithEntity.title: DescribeAlertsWithEntity
DescribeAlertsWithEntity.summary: Queries the alerts that are associated with an entity.

DescribeAlertsWithEvent.title: DescribeAlertsWithEvent
DescribeAlertsWithEvent.summary: Queries the alerts that are associated with an event.

DescribeAuth.title: DescribeAuth
DescribeAuth.summary: Checks whether the security information and event management (SIEM) system is granted the required permissions to access other cloud resources within your Alibaba Cloud account and whether the AliyunServiceRoleForSasCloudSiem service-linked role is created.

DescribeAutomateResponseConfigCounter.title: DescribeAutomateResponseConfigCounter
DescribeAutomateResponseConfigCounter.summary: Queries the number of automated response rules.

DescribeAutomateResponseConfigFeature.title: DescribeAutomateResponseConfigFeature
DescribeAutomateResponseConfigFeature.summary: Queries the configurable fields and operators of an automated response rule.

DescribeCloudSiemAssets.title: DescribeCloudSiemAssets
DescribeCloudSiemAssets.summary: Queries the assets that are associated with an event.

DescribeCloudSiemAssetsCounter.title: DescribeCloudSiemAssetsCounter
DescribeCloudSiemAssetsCounter.summary: Queries the number of assets that are associated with an event by asset type.

DescribeCloudSiemEventDetail.title: DescribeCloudSiemEventDetail
DescribeCloudSiemEventDetail.summary: Queries the details of an event.

DescribeCustomizeRuleCount.title: DescribeCustomizeRuleCount
DescribeCustomizeRuleCount.summary: Queries the number of custom rules.

DescribeCustomizeRuleTest.title: DescribeCustomizeRuleTest
DescribeCustomizeRuleTest.summary: Queries the historical simulation data that is used in a simulation test scenario.

DescribeCustomizeRuleTestHistogram.title: DescribeCustomizeRuleTestHistogram
DescribeCustomizeRuleTestHistogram.summary: Queries the chart that displays the test results of business data for a custom rule.

DescribeDataSourceInstance.title: DescribeDataSourceInstance
DescribeDataSourceInstance.summary: Queries the details of a data source.

DescribeDataSourceParameters.title: DescribeDataSourceParameters
DescribeDataSourceParameters.summary: Queries the parameters of a data source.

DescribeDisposeAndPlaybook.title: DescribeDisposeAndPlaybook
DescribeDisposeAndPlaybook.summary: Queries the list of entities and playbooks that need to be handled.

DescribeDisposeStrategyPlaybook.title: DescribeDisposeStrategyPlaybook
DescribeDisposeStrategyPlaybook.summary: Queries the list of playbooks that are used by a handling policy.

DescribeEntityInfo.title: DescribeEntityInfo
DescribeEntityInfo.summary: Queries the details of an entity.

DescribeEventCountByThreatLevel.title: DescribeEventCountByThreatLevel
DescribeEventCountByThreatLevel.summary: Queries the number of events by type.

DescribeEventDispose.title: DescribeEventDispose
DescribeEventDispose.summary: Queries the handling policies of a historical event.

DescribeImportedLogCount.title: DescribeImportedLogCount
DescribeImportedLogCount.summary: Queries the number of logs that are added to the threat analysis feature.

DescribeLogFields.title: DescribeLogFields
DescribeLogFields.summary: Queries the fields that can be configured for a custom rule.

DescribeLogSource.title: DescribeLogSource
DescribeLogSource.summary: Queries the log sources that can be configured for a custom rule.

DescribeLogType.title: DescribeLogType
DescribeLogType.summary: Queries the log types that can be configured for a custom rule.

DescribeOperators.title: DescribeOperators
DescribeOperators.summary: Queries the operator of a custom rule.

DescribeProdCount.title: DescribeProdCount
DescribeProdCount.summary: Queries the number of services that can be added to the threat analysis feature in Alibaba Cloud, Tenant Cloud, and Huawei Cloud.

DescribeScopeUsers.title: DescribeScopeUsers
DescribeScopeUsers.summary: Queries the list of users in the playbook scope.

DescribeServiceStatus.title: DescribeServiceStatus
DescribeServiceStatus.summary: Checks whether the threat analysis feature is authorized to access a resource directory.

DescribeStorage.title: DescribeStorage
DescribeStorage.summary: Queries the status of the Logstores for the threat analysis feature in Simple Log Service on the user side.

DescribeUserBuyStatus.title: DescribeUserBuyStatus
DescribeUserBuyStatus.summary: Checks whether the current Alibaba Cloud account or the management account of a resource directory is used to purchase the threat analysis feature.

DescribeWafScope.title: DescribeWafScope
DescribeWafScope.summary: Queries the protected domain names of the WAF instance for a user to which an entity belongs.

DescribeWhiteRuleList.title: DescribeWhiteRuleList
DescribeWhiteRuleList.summary: Queries a list of whitelist rules for alerts.

EnableAccessForCloudSiem.title: EnableAccessForCloudSiem
EnableAccessForCloudSiem.summary: Creates a service-linked role named AliyunServiceRoleForSasCloudSiem for the threat analysis feature. The feature can assume this role to access cloud services.

EnableServiceForCloudSiem.title: EnableServiceForCloudSiem
EnableServiceForCloudSiem.summary: Authorizes the threat analysis feature to access a resource directory. This operation must be called by the management account of the resource directory.

GetCapacity.title: GetCapacity
GetCapacity.summary: Queries the storage capacity usage of the threat analysis feature and the purchased storage capacity

GetStorage.title: GetStorage
GetStorage.summary: Queries the storage configurations for the threat analysis feature on the user side.

ListAccountAccessId.title: ListAccountAccessId
ListAccountAccessId.summary: Queries a list of AccessKey IDs of third-party cloud accounts that are added to the threat analysis feature.

ListAllProds.title: ListAllProds
ListAllProds.summary: Queries a list of cloud services that can be added to the threat analysis feature.

ListBindAccount.title: ListBindAccount
ListBindAccount.summary: Queries a list of cloud accounts that are added to the threat analysis feature.

ListBindDataSources.title: ListBindDataSources
ListBindDataSources.summary: Queries a list of data sources that are added to the threat analysis feature.

ListCustomizeRuleTestResult.title: ListCustomizeRuleTestResult
ListCustomizeRuleTestResult.summary: Queries the test results of a custom rule.

ListDataSourceLogs.title: ListDataSourceLogs
ListDataSourceLogs.summary: Queries the logs of a data source.

ListDataSourceTypes.title: ListDataSourceTypes
ListDataSourceTypes.summary: Queries a list of data source types in third-party cloud services that can be added to the threat analysis feature.

ListDelivery.title: ListDelivery
ListDelivery.summary: Queries the information about the cloud services that are integrated with the threat analysis feature, the logs of the cloud services, and the delivery of the logs.

ListImportedLogsByProd.title: ListImportedLogsByProd
ListImportedLogsByProd.summary: Queries the details of the logs in a cloud service that is added to the threat analysis feature.

ListProjectLogStores.title: ListProjectLogStores
ListProjectLogStores.summary: Queries the dedicated Simple Log Service project and Logstore for a cloud service based on the patterns of the project and Logstore names.

ListRdUsers.title: ListRdUsers
ListRdUsers.summary: Queries a list of Alibaba Cloud accounts that are added to the threat analysis feature for centralized management. These accounts can be used to perform operations supported by the threat analysis feature, such as adding logs and handling events.

ModifyBindAccount.title: ModifyBindAccount
ModifyBindAccount.summary: Modifies a third-party cloud account that is added to the threat analysis feature.

ModifyDataSource.title: ModifyDataSource
ModifyDataSource.summary: Modifies a data source that is added to the threat analysis feature.

ModifyDataSourceLog.title: ModifyDataSourceLog
ModifyDataSourceLog.summary: Modifies the description of the logs that are added to the threat analysis feature for a data source within a cloud account.

OpenDelivery.title: OpenDelivery
OpenDelivery.summary: Enables the log delivery feature for a cloud service that is integrated with Simple Log Service.

PostAutomateResponseConfig.title: PostAutomateResponseConfig
PostAutomateResponseConfig.summary: Creates or updates an automatic response rule.

PostCustomizeRule.title: PostCustomizeRule
PostCustomizeRule.summary: Creates or updates a custom rule.

PostCustomizeRuleTest.title: PostCustomizeRuleTest
PostCustomizeRuleTest.summary: Submits a custom rule for testing.

PostFinishCustomizeRuleTest.title: PostFinishCustomizeRuleTest
PostFinishCustomizeRuleTest.summary: Ends the test of a custom rule.

PostRuleStatusChange.title: PostRuleStatusChange
PostRuleStatusChange.summary: Updates the status of a custom rule.

RestoreCapacity.title: RestoreCapacity
RestoreCapacity.summary: Releases storage to reduce the storage usage. The release operation is irreversible and may cause data loss. Proceed with caution.

SetStorage.title: SetStorage
SetStorage.summary: Configures the settings of log storage, such as the storage duration and storage region.

SubmitImportLogTasks.title: SubmitImportLogTasks
SubmitImportLogTasks.summary: Submits log collection tasks at a time.

UpdateAutomateResponseConfigStatus.title: UpdateAutomateResponseConfigStatus
UpdateAutomateResponseConfigStatus.summary: Updates the status of an automatic response rule.

UpdateWhiteRuleList.title: UpdateWhiteRuleList
UpdateWhiteRuleList.summary: Creates or updates an alert whitelist rule.
